code: import _toConsumableArray from"/Users/eri/microverse/Javascript/book-store/node_modules/babel-preset-react-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray";var ADD_BOOK='bookStore/books/ADD_BOOK';var REMOVE_BOOK='bookStore/books/REMOVE_BOOK';var initialState=[];var addBook=function addBook(payload){return{type:ADD_BOOK,payload:payload};};var removeBook=function removeBook(payload){return{type:REMOVE_BOOK,payload:payload};};var reducer=function reducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ADD_BOOK:return[].concat(_toConsumableArray(state),[action.payload]);case REMOVE_BOOK:{return state.filter(function(book){return book.id!==action.payload;});}default:return state;}};export{reducer as default,addBook,removeBook};
